actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works under authority of the order of the Senate of August 10, 1984
actions.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works under authority of the order of the Senate of August 10, 1984.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to eliminate the requirement that the portion of the Baltimore-Washington Parkway located in the State of Maryland be conveyed to the State of Maryland upon completion of the reconstruction of the Parkway authorized by the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1970.

summary.text: Declares that the Secretary of the Interior shall not be required to convey to Maryland any portion of the Baltimore-Washington Parkway located in such State upon completion of the reconstruction of the parkway as authorized by the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1970.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate the requirement that the portion of the Baltimore-Washington Parkway located in the State of Maryland be conveyed to the State of Maryland upon completion of the reconstruction of the Parkway authorized by the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1970.
